text: The Bolonka Zwetna is a Russian bred Toy Dog for companionship, and belong to the Bichon-Family. This little Dog have all colors but not allowed to be white or piebald color. The size is 20 cm - 26 cm, and 3-4 kl. This Dog is the colored version of the Bolonka Franzuska. ==References== Category:Bichon Category:Dog breeds originating in Russia Category:Dog breeds Category:Rare dog breeds
title: Bolonka Zwetna
